summary: A unit‑test module that verifies the MONAI HausdorffDistance handler. It checks that the handler correctly computes the Hausdorff distance on synthetic 3‑D spherical segmentations, respects reduction settings, and raises errors when input tensors have incompatible shapes.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the Hausdorff distance metric used for evaluating medical image segmentation models, supporting reliable model assessment and continuous integration testing.
